articles.title: Diablo IV hotfixes tweak classes, fix bugs, and make late-game enemies stronger - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Diablo 4 received a couple of hot fixes to fix some bugs, but also to nerf the Sorcerer and Rogue slightly and to make late-game enemies stronger.

articles.title: Microsoft Kills Cortana in Windows - Thurrott.com - Thurrott.com
articles.description: Continuing the years-long winddown of its digital assistant, Microsoft quietly revealed that it will stop supporting Cortana in Windows 10/11.
articles.content:
Continuing the years-long winddown of its personal digital assistant, Microsoft quietly revealed that it will stop supporting Cortana in Windows 10 and 11 in late 2023.

articles.title: ‘A first’ from Mars: European spacecraft sends livestream from red planet - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: A European spacecraft around Mars sent its first livestream from the red planet to Earth on Friday to mark the 20th anniversary of its launch, but rain in Spain interfered at times.

articles.title: Eighty million years of rapid evolution of the primate Y chromosome - Nature.com
articles.description: Comparative analysis of Y chromosomes across 29 primate species reveals rapid evolution and shows different patterns of evolution among regions of the Y chromosome during primate diversification.
